Token.Abstract: RKPropertyMapping is an abstract class for describing the properties being mapped within an RKObjectMapping or RKEntityMapping object. It defines the common interface for its concrete subclasses RKAttributeMapping and RKRelationshipMapping. Each property mapping defines a single transformation from a source key path (often in the deserialized representation of a JSON or XML document) to a destination key path (typically on a target object).
Returns the object mapping the receiver is added to.
Returns the object mapping the receiver is added to.
A key path on the source object from which to get information that is to be mapped onto the destination object.
A key path on the source object from which to get information that is to be mapped onto the destination object.
A key path on the destination object on which to set information that has been mapped from the source object.
A key path on the destination object on which to set information that has been mapped from the source object.
Compares the receiving property mapping to another property mapping.

Parameter.Name: otherMapping
Parameter.Abstract: The property mapping object with which to compare the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if otherMapping specifies the same mapping as the receiver, otherwise NO.
